body_html:
Thanks for a prompt reply. What exactly is "non-constant" initializer?
when I tried:
w = tf.Variable(tf.random_uniform((2000,1000000),dtype=dtype),dtype="float32") with tf.Session() as sess: sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
gives me ResourceExhaustedError (OOM) on GTX 1080 with 11GB of memory (tensor is 8GB large).

(Sorry for for perhaps a silly question, I am a complete layman in TF)

body:
Thanks for a prompt reply. What exactly is "non-constant" initializer?
when I tried: 
`
w = tf.Variable(tf.random_uniform((2000,1000000),dtype=dtype),dtype="float32")
with tf.Session() as sess:
  sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
`
gives me ResourceExhaustedError (OOM) on GTX 1080 with 11GB of memory (tensor is 8GB large).

(Sorry for for perhaps a silly question, I am a complete layman in TF)
